page.title: 05Shopping,Sherburn-in-Elmet.
page.content: {The Shopping Patterns in Sherburn.} Most people interviewed shop for food at big supermarkets in Selby,Leeds,Crossgates,Pontefract and Knottingley and buy things they run out of from the local food shops.Most people buy their clothes from big city stores like Marks and Spencers,B.H.S.,C and A,and Littlewoods.There are four petrol stations but most parents buy their petrol outside the village.There are two banks,Nat.West and Midland and three building societies,the Halifax,the Abbey National and the Leeds and Holbeck.Many of the shops tend to be mixed businesses with one main line.The post office,for example also sells cards,stationary,jewellry and toys.The newspaper shops sell toys,sweets,cigarettes and greetings cards.
